title: Implement associated items

labels.name: metabug
labels.description: Issues about issues themselves ("bugs about bugs")

labels.name: B-RFC-approved
labels.description: Approved by a merged RFC but not yet implemented.

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Tracking issue for https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/195

This meta-bug contains links to the most significant tasks remaining for associated items. For a comprehensive listing of bugs, please [search using the A-associated-items label](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels/A-associated-items).

Post 1.0 Tasks
- [ ] Normalize associated types used in where clauses (#20765) and associated type bounds (#20775)
- [ ] Implement associated lifetimes (see Issue #17842),
- [ ] Update library code for associated constants (see Issue #17825).

Completed Tasks
- [x] Implement associated output types (see PR #16377),
- [x] Update library code for associated output types (see Issue #17826),
- [x] Implement multi-dispatch (see PR #17669),
- [x] Update library code for multi-dispatch (see Issue #17827),
- [x] ICE: Unbound path #17388 
- [x] Clarify outlives requirements on projected types (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20303)
- [x] Integrate projection types into method dispatch #20469
- [x] Some types not normalized? #20604
- [x] ICE with missing impl items https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20347
- [x] Associated types should permit builtin bounds (#17921)
- [x] Implement `Trait<Out=Type>` syntax (#18432)
- [x] Support `T::Type` syntax (#18433)
- [x] Associated types are used as inputs for multidispatch (#18437)
- [x] Traits with associated types appearing on structs, enums, or other traits (#18768)
- [x] Qualified paths don't check type arguments in the trait reference (#18865)
- [x]  rustdoc panics when dealing with associated types (#18594)
- [x] Associated types  should permit arbitrary bounds (#18178)
- [x] Associated types need to do transitive bound expansion (#18434)
- [x] Traits with where clauses that themselves reference traits with assoc types (#18436)
- [x] Integrate object projection predicates into rustdoc (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20299)
- [x] Convert T::Foo resolution to use where clauses, not bounds (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/20300)
- [x] Implement associated constants (see Issue #17841),
- [x] Implement defaults for associated types (see issue #19476),

Declined tasks
- ~~Permit unqualified references to associated types of the trait within the trait definition (#18764)~~
- ~~Update library code for associated lifetimes (see Issue #17828),~~
